docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: A curated list of DevOps project ideas spanning across different tools.

docs.title: Contribution
docs.text: To contribute: * fork the repository * clone your fork * create pull request

docs.title: Beginner Projects
docs.text: Create an EC2 instance Create a simple EC2 instance to host an Apache Server  Create an EC2 instance Create a simple EC2 instance to host an Apache Server

docs.title: Intermediate Projects
docs.text: App Deployment Deploy a simple application to a cloud platform like AWS or Google Cloud. You can start with a simple web application or a database, and use the platform's documentation to guide you through the deployment process.
